title: Axiom Discs Watermelon Edition Sublimated Towel
features: PORTABLE - 23.75”x15.5” towel for maximum on-the-go drying and cleaning potential.
MULTIPURPOSE - Great for drying discs or general at home use.
FITS ANY BAG - Features a clip for easy bag attachment.
description: An essential accessory for any disc golfer’s bag — Axiom’s Watermelon Edition Towel is a vibrant, full-color sublimated towel that is sure to turn heads while keeping your discs dry. This large towel has a pocketed texture for added absorption and comes with an attached clip to easily secure your towel on the go. Just as useful at home as it is on the course, the Watermelon Edition Towel is going to be a staple for many disc golfers!
